attributes.action: Say Yes to Airport Body Scanning for a Better, Safer Country / World Well - Being
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently Human Rights Officers have come out in saying that the Airport Scanners are unlawful.
How can this be?
It is a safety measure, surely its better to walk through a scanner and be properly checked than just to have the beep (metal) system as security.
What are the Human Right Officers so worried about? 
Their words said "...discriminate against vulnerable groups or harm good community relations."
How can this be if the scanner is for every person that goes through the airport? Its not discriminating against any particular ethnic or religious minority. Its for EVERYONE
If people protest that much about something which is not actually doing any harm, its becuase They are worried of the outcome for themselves, not for others.

So say YES to airport Scanners what harm is there in doing so? Other than better safety!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
